title: Media Bias Analysis Pipeline — NLP at Scale
summary: Built an NLP pipeline on 50,000+ health news articles, using BERTopic for theme discovery and fine-tuned DistilBERT to boost macro F1-score by 45%, improving minority emotion recall 10X; leveraged RoBERTa to reveal emotional framing patterns in biased content.
architecture: Large-scale text ingestion → cleaning → preprocessing pipeline
BERTopic clustering → topic extraction → bias identification
